name: QMood
text: How are you feeling today? Please click on the spot that best represents your mood

name: QMood2
text: How are you feeling today? Please click on the spot that best represents your mood

name: Q1d
text: This morning, overall I have felt…

name: Q2d
text: This morning, overall I have felt…

text: This morning, overall I have felt…

name: Q4d
text: This morning, overall I have felt…

name: Q5d
text: This morning, overall I have felt…

name: Q6d
text: This morning, overall I have felt…

name: Q7d
text: This morning, overall I have felt…

name: Q8d
text: This morning, overall I have felt…

name: Q9d
text: This morning, overall I have felt…

name: Q10d
text: This morning, overall I have felt…

name: Q11d
text: This morning, overall I have felt…

name: Q12d
text: This morning, overall I have felt…

name: Q13d
text: This morning, overall I have felt…

name: Q14d
text: This morning, has anything stressful occurred?

name: Q15d
text: How stressful was it?

name: Q16d
text: How recently did this happen?

name: Q17d
text: How much did you feel that you could control the outcome of this event?

name: Q18d
text: In general, how stressed have you felt this morning?

name: Q19d
text: What time did you go to bed last night?

name: Q20d
text: How long (in minutes) did it take you to fall asleep?

name: Q21d
text: What time did you wake up this morning?

name: Q22d
text: How many hours did you sleep (last night)?

name: Q23d
text: Did you wake up in the middle of the night or early morning, before you meant to? (i.e., Early morning = prior to alarm or predetermined waking time)

name: Q24d
text: Overall, how would you rate last night's sleep quality?

name: Q25d
text: This morning, have you had any interactions with another person (in person, by phone, online, text)?

name: Q26d
text: Who did you interact with?

name: Q27d
text: Overall, how positive were these interactions? (Integer scale: 0=not at all, 6=extremely)

name: Q28d
text: Overall, how negative were these interactions? (Integer scale: 0=not at all, 6=extremely)

name: Q29d
text: The following questions will ask you about things that may have happened YESTERDAY/LAST NIGHT. Please answer each question as honestly as you can, and remember that all of your responses will be kept confidential.

name: Q30d
text: Please use the standard drink figure below to aid your response to the following questions.

name: Q31d
text: How many drinks of alcohol did you drink yesterday/last night?

name: Q32d
text: Consider the drinks you had yesterday/last night. Please enter the TOTAL number of beer that you consumed yesterday/last night. If you did not drink a particular type of drink last night, please input a zero (0).

name: Q33d
text: Consider the drinks you had yesterday/last night. Please enter the TOTAL number of wine that you consumed yesterday/last night. If you did not drink a particular type of drink last night, please input a zero (0).

name: Q34d
text: Consider the drinks you had yesterday/last night. Please enter the TOTAL number of Liquor (Not mixed) that you consumed yesterday/last night. If you did not drink a particular type of drink last night, please input a zero (0).

name: Q35d
text: Consider the drinks you had yesterday/last night. Please enter the TOTAL number of Mixed drink (non-caffeinated) that you consumed yesterday/last night. If you did not drink a particular type of drink last night, please input a zero (0).

name: Q36d
text: Consider the drinks you had yesterday/last night. Please enter the TOTAL number of Mixed drink (caffeinated regular soda mixed with alcohol) that you consumed yesterday/last night. If you did not drink a particular type of drink last night, please input a zero (0).

name: Q37d
text: Consider the drinks you had yesterday/last night. Please enter the TOTAL number of Mixed drink (caffeinated diet soda mixed with alcohol) that you consumed yesterday/last night. If you did not drink a particular type of drink last night, please input a zero (0).

name: Q38d
text: Consider the drinks you had yesterday/last night. Please enter the TOTAL number of Mixed drink (caffeinated energy drink, e.g. Red Bull, mixed with alcohol) that you consumed yesterday/last night. If you did not drink a particular type of drink last night, please input a zero (0).

name: Q39d
text: Did you pre-game yesterday/last night (i.e., drink prior to the main drinking event)?

name: Q40d
text: Did you play drinking games yesterday/last night?

name: Q41d
text: As a result of drinking yesterday, did you …? (Check all that apply)

choices: get in trouble with the police or Penn State Authorities for drinking
end up in bad physical shape the next day
find yourself in a situation where no one was sober enough to drive
do something sexually you wouldn’t have done if you hadn’t been drinking
have a sexual experience you wish you hadn’t
wake up in an unexpected place
blackout, or find yourself unable to remember large stretches of time from last night
get into a physical fight with someone
get into an argument with someone

name: Q42d
text: As a result of drinking yesterday, did you …? (Check all that apply)

name: Q43d
text: Did something else happen as a result of drinking yesterday that was not mentioned?

name: Q44d
text: Please describe what happened

name: Q45d
text: Yesterday, did you … ? (Check all that apply)

choices: get in trouble with the police or Penn State Authorities
have a sexual experience you wish you hadn’t
get into a physical fight with someone
get into an argument with someone

name: Q46d
text: What reasons did you have for deciding not to drink? (Check all that apply)

name: Q47d
text: Where were you last night? (Check all that apply)

name: Q48d
text: Please describe where you were last night.

name: Q49d
text: Who were you with last night? (Check all that apply)

name: Q50d
text: Were any of these people drinking last night?

name: Q51d
text: Were any of these people drinking too much last night?

name: Q52d
text: Did you smoke any cigarettes last night, even one or two puffs?

name: Q53d
text: Yesterday, about how many cigarettes did you smoke?

choices: 1 or more puffs, but never a whole cigarette

name: Q54d
text: Were you around other people who were smoking cigarettes last night?

name: Q55d
text: Did you use electronic cigarettes last night?

name: Q56d
text: Did you use marijuana last night?

name: Q57d
text: Did you take amphetamines (e.g., Ritalin, Adderall, Methamphetamine) last night that were not prescribed for you?

name: Q58d
text: Did you take opioids (e.g., hydrocodone, oxycodone, fentanyl) last night that were not prescribed for you?

name: Q59d
text: Do you intend to drink today/tonight?

name: Q60d
text: Today/tonight, do you intend to drink more than, less than, or about the same as usual?

name: Q61d
text: Do you plan to get drunk?
